pos: noun or participle which takes the aux. verb suru
nouns which may take the genitive case particle 'no'

lessons.japanese: 恐らく彼は弁論大会に優勝するだろう。
lessons.english: It is probable that he will win the speech contest.

lessons.japanese: はじめ彼は自分が弁論大会で優勝した事が分からなかった。
lessons.english: At first he did not realize that he had won the speech contest.

lessons.japanese: おそらく彼女はその弁論大会で優勝するだろう。
lessons.english: It is probable that she will win the speech contest.

lessons.japanese: エミリーは弁論大会で１等賞をとった。
lessons.english: Emily won first prize in the speech contest.

lessons.japanese: 勿論彼女は弁論大会に参加すると思った。
lessons.english: We took it for granted that she would take part in the speech contest.

lessons.japanese: 弁論大会で優勝されておめでとうございます。
lessons.english: I congratulate you on winning first prize in the speech contest.

lessons.japanese: 弁護士たちはその事件を何時間も弁論した。
lessons.english: The lawyers argued the case for hours.

lessons.japanese: 彼はテニスと弁論の代表チームの一員である。
lessons.english: He is on the varsity in tennis and in debating.

lessons.japanese: 大学生である姉は、弁論大会で優勝した。
lessons.english: My sister, a university student, won first prize in the speech contest.

lessons.japanese: 私は彼が弁論大会で優勝すると確信している。
lessons.english: I am sure of his winning the speech contest.

lessons.japanese: 私は幸いにもその弁論大会で優勝した。
lessons.english: I had the fortune to win the first prize in the speech contest.

lessons.japanese: 私はその英語弁論大会に参加しました。
lessons.english: I took part in the English speech contest.

lessons.japanese: 私はその英語弁論大会に参加しました。
lessons.english: I participated in that English speech contest.
